title: Hi I am NZ Challenger ADC LFT for the New Zealand Gaming Championship Tournament
body:
I was ranked 40 on the ladder couples weeks ago, lost elo since then, but am quality ADC, would like to be with other high level NZ players Diamond 3 & above. 
IGN: **ecotoxic**
Have had good amount of experience in ranked 5's did open ladder previous this year. Was challenger in ranked 5's (easy) but may as well say.
If in the right team I will have the attitude of super try hard serious and with the goal of winning tournament. I am very focused player and will take this seriously.
Add me in game if you are interested and seeking very strong ADC.
